FuncDef: The reset flow-car command clears flow CAR entries on a specific board or a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a source or destination IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the slot ID of an interface board.
-

Clears flow CAR entries on a device.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When flow-car is run to configure flow CAR, if no traffic matches a flow CAR entry within 5 minutes, the system deletes the flow CAR entry. To manually delete a flow CAR entry, run the reset flow-car command.
To delete flow CAR entries on a device, run the reset flow-car all command.
To clear flow CAR entries with specific source IP addresses, run the reset flow-car source-ip slot command.
To clear flow CAR entries with specific destination IP addresses, run the reset flow-car destination-ip slot command.
To delete all flow CAR entries on the board, run the reset flow-car slot command.
